definition: a seller of shoddy goods, wrangle over a price, terms of an agreement and so on
details:
noun
- a seller of shoddy goods
= synonyms: cheap-jack
- a person who writes radio or tv advertisements
verb
- wrangle over a price, terms of an agreement and so on
= example: wrangle over a price, terms of an agreement and so on
= synonyms: haggle
- sell or offer for sale from place to place
= synonyms: pitch
